description.en: The series continues! with "Golden Time", the second part of the Light and Shadow trilogy. Alex, the Duke Eli and Duchess Edna's eldest son, has accomplished brilliant achievements. But he doesn't want to be a frog in a well protected from dangers by his parents, thus he sets out on a journey to become a real king. While he gathers trustworthy companions, one by one, Alex begins to feel attracted to Kenny, an extroverted wandering young boy that joins the group by accident. It turns out that Kenny's real identity is Northia's Second Princess and Duke Frederick's wife. The joy of the meeting in another era, the love of the two would bring the burning fire of a great war.
description.es:
¡La serie continúa! con “Golden Time”, Parte 2 de la Trilogía de Luz y Sombra. Alex el hijo mayor del Duque Eli y la Duquesa Edna, ha tenido logros brillantes. Pero no quiere ser una rana en el estanque protegido del peligro por sus padres, por lo que emprende un viaje para convertirse en un verdadero rey. Mientras reúne a sus hombres de confianza, uno por uno, Alexis comienza a sentirse atraído por Kenny, un extrovertido muchacho errante que se une por accidente al grupo. Resulta que la identidad del muchacho es en realidad la segunda princesa de Northia y la esposa del Duque Frederick. La alegría del reencuentro en otro tiempo, el amor de los dos atrae el fuego ardiente de una gran guerra.  
  
(Not to be confused with *[Golden Time](https://mangadex.org/title/4437/golden-time)* a manga/LN written by author [Yuyuko Takemiya](https://mangadex.org/search?author=TAKEMIYA%20Yuyuko))
